title: Donald Trump says he is working to arrange meeting between Putin and Zelensky
byline: US President Donald Trump says he’s begun arranging a meeting between Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and Russian President Vladimir Putin after a summit today with Zelensky and European leaders.

title: Few showers expected in parts of the island today
byline: A few showers will occur in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Kandy, NuwaraEliya, Galle and Matara districts.

title: US State Department revokes 6,000 student visas
byline: The State Department has revoked more than 6,000 international student visas because of violations of US law and overstays, the department told the BBC.

title: Postal strike continues today – Unions seek President’s intervention
byline: The United Postal Trade Union Front states that the island-wide strike launched by postal workers will continue today (19) as well.

title: Former NLB Director Thusitha Halloluwa arrested
byline: Thusitha Halloluwa, the Former Director of the National Lotteries Board (NLB), who was evading court, has been arrested early this morning (19), Police stated.

title: Second reading of Gambling Regulatory Authority Bill in Parliament today
byline: The second reading of the Gambling Regulatory Authority Bill is scheduled to take place in Parliament today.

title: ‘Quazi court’ judge and wife arrested for soliciting bribe in Kalmunai
byline: A Quazi court judge in Kalmunai and his wife have been arrested by the Bribery Commission on allegations of soliciting a bribe.
